mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member ( member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_status, member_email, member_phone ) values ( seq_tbl_member_no.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, 'y', #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone} )
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_status as memberStatus from tbl_member where member_id = #{_parameter}

select member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_status as memberStatus, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, join_date as joinDate from tbl_member where member_id = #{_parameter}
